pages.text: $(bred)Bungee Zombie$() loves to take risks. After all, what's the point of being dead if you don't live a little?$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)45$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It has 2 ways to attack. one is $(l)steal and kill its enemy$(), it can $(bred)only be hurt when stealing$() which will cost $(l)4 seconds$() to stay. another is $(l)transport zombie to ground$().$(br)$(bpurple)Weakness$() : $(bgreen)Umbrella Leaf$().
